title: Error building from source CMakeFiles/Makefile2:201: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/all' failed
body_html:
Hi all,

After running python setup.py install on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS(CUDA 9.1), I encounter the following error:

/home/ubuntu/pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN/LookupTable.cu(25): warning: function "__shfl(int, int, int)"
/usr/local/cuda/include/sm_30_intrinsics.hpp(152): here was declared deprecated ("__shfl() is deprecated in favor of __shfl_sync() and may be removed in a future release (Use -Wno-deprecated-declarations to suppress this warning).")

/home/ubuntu/pytorch/aten/src/THCUNN/LookupTable.cu(42): warning: function "__any"
/usr/local/cuda/include/device_atomic_functions.h(180): here was declared deprecated ("__any() is deprecated in favor of __any_sync() and may be removed in a future release (Use -Wno-deprecated-declarations to suppress this warning).")

PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

We like to limit our issues to bug reports and feature requests. If you have a question or would like help and support, please visit our forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].

PyTorch version:

  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): source
  • Python version: 3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.1
  • GPU models and configuration: K80
  • GCC version (if compiling from source): 5.4.0 20160609
  • CMake version: cmake version 3.9.4

In addition, including the following information will also be very helpful for us to diagnose the problem:

  • A script to reproduce the bug. Please try to provide as minimal of a test case as possible.
  • Error messages and/or stack traces of the bug
  • Context around what you are trying to do

Just wondering if anyone knows how I can fix this.

Thanks

After running python setup.py install  on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS(CUDA 9.1), I encounter the following error:

body:
Hi all, 

After running ` python setup.py install `  on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS(CUDA 9.1), I encounter the following error:
